name: Small Potion
desc: A bottle of diluted Faery Water, heal 20 hp

name: Potion
desc: A bottle of Faery Water, heal 40 hp

name: High Potion
desc: A bottle of Faery Essence, heal 80 hp

name: Master Sword
desc: Sword of legend given by goddess Hylia herself, give +20 damage against boss
